text: Question 11 A main memory unit with a capacity of 4 megabytes is built using 1Mx1-bit DRAM chips. Each DRAM chip has 1K rows of cells with 1K cells in each row. The time taken for a single refresh operation is 100 nanoseconds. The time required to perform one refresh operation on all the cells in the memory unit is e 100 nanoseconds @ 100 *21Â° nanoseconds G 100*2% nanoseconds @ 320022 nanoseconds GATE CSE 2010 Computer Organization
